attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a government run by a caretaker prime minister who has destroyed this country's finances both as chancellor and prime minister, and to revoke all laws created in the last 12-13 yrs of government which is in excess of 3000 which destroy civil liberties and human rights aswell as his role in an illegal war in iraq.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
